email_body: I ordered 3 different things...I thought your "wine inventory listings are updated DAILY" ??? sales@popswine.com (Pops wine Sales) on 03/05/2001 02:28:38 PM To: <jarnold@enron.com> cc: Subject: RE: Pops Order Number 20267 John Arnold Thank You for your on-line order!
